item.description:
Join us for a TGIF happy hours at Terrace Lounge. Centrally located in the heart of downtown Boston, The Terrace at Avenue One provides the perfect setting for after work cocktails, an evening of relaxation and music under a vast, starry sky.

The Terrace is only open Tuesday though Friday, weather permitting. Let's enjoy the warm summer nite, kick back and relax after a long week of hard work. We will meet at 6:00 pm, afterward we will go to dinner (optional) in Chinatown around 8 pm @ Jade Garden.

We will order some apps too which are half price between 5 and 7 pm.

We have many new members who have joined recently and this would be a great event to come and meet us and others in a casual setting. We hope you can make it.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for friendly group of asians

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: TGIF at Terrace Lounge, Hyatt Regency Boston Downtown
